overview: Tony Di Benedetto is Co-Founder and Managing Partner at Data Centers Canada. Tony is responsible for Data Centers Canada business development initiatives including overseeing Sales and Marketing and strategic direction of the organization. Prior to co-founding Data Centers Canada, Tony was instrumental in building and acquiring several highly successful Canadian IT services organizations including IT managed services, wireless networks and internet hosting enterprises. Tony brings over 17 years of IT entrepreneurship, technology M&A and capital markets experience to the Data Centers Canada management team. He received his degree at York University.
